dublin_core.dcvalue: Patients require education and information as they engage in self help self care and disease management activities The objective of this study was to explore the acceptance of voice technologies in diabetes patient education Eighteen participants listened to a total of 324 diabetes educational messages and were provided the opportunity to rate the usefulness of each message This study demonstrated that brief telephone based education can be acceptable and useful
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Acceptance of diabetes education via the telephone.
